channel.title: The shadow neutral killer
channel.description:
The shadow
Passive dark shroud cannot be occupied or redirected
Passive 2 master of darkness you will see all abilities that targeted you
Day ability one dark armor infinite uses (use someone’s shadow as armor all attacks against you will instead happen to your target) Day ability two total darkness disable a players day ability’s (2 uses)
Night ability one shadow step infinite uses stalk a player killing whoever they visit if they visit nobody attack them
Night ability 2 infinite uses dark mark plant a dark mark on a player if two peop with dark marks viset each othe the will die bypass granted protection (example will kill the king using guards but not the mastermind)

item.title: The shadow neutral killer
item.dc:creator: Scl007
item.description:
The shadow

Passive dark shroud cannot be occupied or redirected

Passive 2 master of darkness you will see all abilities that targeted you

Day ability one dark armor infinite uses (use someone’s shadow as armor all attacks against you will instead happen to your target)
Day ability two total darkness disable a players day ability’s (2 uses)

Night ability one shadow step infinite uses stalk a player killing whoever they visit if they visit nobody attack them

Night ability 2 infinite uses dark mark plant a dark mark on a player if two peop with dark marks viset each othe the will die bypass granted protection (example will kill the king using guards but not the mastermind)
